metadata.name: Sentimentite by Agnieszka Kurant 1/100
metadata.description:
Agnieszka Kurant (b. 1978), Sentimentite #1: Birth of Crypto, Mt Gox Hack, 2022. Expanded NFT: ERC-721 (NFT) + redeemable as mixed material sculpture (3D print cast in Sentimentite).  
  
Date redeemed: 2022-11-01  
Size: 50cm diameter  
Production cost: USDC [43,200](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1ee5db3d277786e142af7cce1b906798deacdc28cd44817bc169fc09d78fdd83)  
[Certificate of Authenticity](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/CoA%201_100%20Drop%2007.pdf)  
[Condition Report](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Condition%20Report%201_100%20Drop%2007.pdf)  
Artwork details: [image #1](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Sentimentite-1.jpg), [image #2](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Sentimentite-2.jpg), [image #3](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Sentimentite-3.jpg), [image #4](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Sentimentite-4.jpg), [image #5](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/Sentimentite-5.jpg)  
4k files for display: [animation](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/UNREDEEMED_2160_MtGoxHack.mp4) (black), [animation](https://bafybeif33rn3fz7fwj66f4wcj3vg2eeuhyaizrmisaikl7hr6cwfqb3wbe.ipfs.nftstorage.link/REDEEMED_2160_MtGoxHack.mp4) (white)  
Display: for assistance or advice with display, please contact Zien
